extdesc.message: Adds a context menu to right click where you can choose to swap to a different domain with the path and variables being intact. Useful if you manage a website with many servers and different domains.

always_active_desc.message: If unchecked the menu items will only be active if on one of the domains above.

clear_all_settings_confirm.message: Do you really want to clear all settings?
clear_all_settings_confirm.description: Do you really want to clear all settings?
